mapper.select: select t.emp_name as team_mgr_name,t.emp_no as team_mgr_no,a.emp_name as mgr_name,a.emp_no as mgr_no from (select emp_name,emp_no from emp where emp_no = (select emp_mgr from emp where emp_no=#{emp_no})) t, (select emp_name,emp_no from emp where job_no=3) a

select approval_no,emp_no,approval_choose_no,to_char(approval_submit_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as approval_submit_date,approval_start_date,approval_end_date,approval_comment, to_char(approval_team_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as approval_team_date,approval_mgr_date from approval where emp_no=#{emp_no}
